data.name: Perfect Maze
data.description:
# Temporaly description:

a maze, let's see

I have to find out if the given maze is perfect, but what is a perfect maze ?
It's when there's always only one way to get from any point A to any point B.

But in what form will the maze be sent to me ?
as a list that looks like this: `maze[y][x][dir]`
x stands for horizontal position, and y for vertical position, each ranging from 0 to {size of maze}. dir is either 0 for the wall below the coordinate or 1 for the right one. by giving all this information, the list will return 0 if we cannot pass, and 1 if we can by this wall

with all this, I must return True if the maze is perfect, and False if it is imperfect or unachievable
